name: Tower of the Moon
description:
Combine runes to cast spells in your quest to reach the Tower of the Moon!

Controls:

  • WASD to move 
  • Tab to open spell inventory
  • 1,2,3,4,E to select/queue spell components
  • Left click to cast spell, right click to cancel

For the curious: code is at https://github.com/lostinnowhere314/bevy-jam-2022

(warning: downloadable MacOS and Linux builds have not been tested; they should work, but let me know if anything breaks)
